name: Jungle Jam (BarricaGames)
description:
Jungle Jam its a game made for the Social Game Jam, Its for 3 to 6 players, its a aparty game like were you are a monkey that had to collect coins the first one to collect the amount ofcoins that you establish won there are three mini games

Kayak:

Try to move faster in the river that any of your fellow monkey sailers, avoid cocodriles rocks and loose in the emptyness

Hunter:

Scare the evil hunters but do not scare other monkey or you will be in trouble

Bongos:

remember the beat and play it all along
